name: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns Custom
description: This is a fork from DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns v.2 by decembre. I worked a lot on customizing it and I wanted to share it. There are various options in this style. Improved for big/wide screens. Update 2015-Nov-12: SearchPreview was preventing multiple columns, this is fixed now. (Thanks rayman88)
